header.p: This test looks to find your most visited state or focus from the perspective of the Physical, Rational and Emotional dimensions of the 3DPsyche.

headings.heading: Sample question
headings.description: Value each option individualy, but mind how they compare to each other. This sample section will simply map your Favorite Color.

headings.heading: Actual test
headings.description: For each option, think of you as compared to people who truly embody them. This section will estimate your 3DPscyhe Test Results.

headings.heading: You are done!
headings.description: The following is an express version that focuses on how you live, not how you are. This section will average the focus or state of your Daily Life.

questions.question: How much do you like these color families?
When appreciating art, how much attention do you give to...?
In your sporting activities, how much do you get into...?
In your studies, how interested are you in...?
In your meals, how much do you tend to mind...?
answers: To feast buffet, taste things, fill up

questions.question: In your work, how much do you focus on...?
In movies or books, how drawn are you to...?
How willing are you to give up rest for...?
answers: Analyzing an intriguing subject ponder, clarify, research
Tending an emotional situation affection, appreciation, care

questions.question: On your free time, how prone are you to look for...?
answers: Work on personal stuff project, hobby, task

questions.question: How much does these statements sound like you?
answers: I am prompt with my duties I need to be done
I am clear with my plans I will lay them out and obverse them
I am true to my values I will not give them up
I am pondering thoughts more than doing physical tasks
I am a subject to my moods more than reasons or norms
I am drawn to the facts more than emotional views or opinions

questions.question: How much does these adjetives resemble you?
answers: Habitual with routines Do as I always do
Particular with tastes Like it the way I like it
Inquisitive Looking to learn and debate things
Overtly sympathetic Even with strangers and animals

questions.question: How strong is your tendency to these things?
answers: Do tasks by myself instead of delegate, supervise or collaborate
Demand freedom and control to do as I please
Avoid other people's dramas do not get involved
Seek group activities to play, work, travel with
Frequent a diversity of people in age, sex, lifestyles and backgrounds

questions.question: In your daily life...
answers: What is your average demand of physical activity? exercise, physical work, monitoring, maneuvering
What is your average demand of rational analysis? organize, figure things out, study, supervise
What is your average demand of emotional affectivity? feelings, caring for family/friends, art
How stressful/tense are your days? physically, mentally or emotionally
How much rest/leisure do you get? physically, mentally and emotionally
How much of your day is focused on yourself? your space, training, studying, selfcare
How much of your daily demands involve others? interact, coordinate, consider

footer.p: Click on a color to see its representation and description within the 3DPsyche.
